{"id":958499297,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1685209110,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"221 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/958499297/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Strength of a Group","memory":"46.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxStrength(vector<int>& nums) {\n        //int mask = 1;\n        int N = nums.size();\n        long result = INT_MIN;\n        for(int mask = 1; mask < (1 << N); mask++) {\n            long prod = 1;\n            for(int i = 0; i < N; i++) {\n                if((mask & (1 << i)) > 0) {\n                    prod *= nums[i];\n                }\n            }\n            result = max(result, prod);\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-strength-of-a-group","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
